price: Teksa drejtohej nga Medjeni, ai tha: “Shpresoj se Zoti im do të më tregojë rrugën e drejtë!”
arabic: وَلَمَّا تَوَجَّهَ تِلۡقَآءَ مَدۡيَنَ قَالَ عَسَىٰ رَبِّيٓ أَن يَهۡدِيَنِي سَوَآءَ ٱلسَّبِيلِ

version.title: Albanian Translation - Hasan Nahi
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Albanian by Hasan Nahi, published by Albanian Institute of Islamic Thought and Civilization, printed in 2006.

meta.transliteration: walammā tawajjaha til'qāa madyana qāla ʿasā rabbī an yahdiyanī sawāa al-sabīli
